name: @p.aleks/redux-subscriptions-manager
author: Aleks P. (https://github.com/aleksplus)

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npx json -f package.json -I -e "delete this.devDependencies" && npx json -f package.json -I -e "this.scripts = {}"
scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:es5
scripts.build:es: rimraf types/ && rimraf es/ && tsc --declaration --declarationDir types/

description: Do not use in new projects.
